Sentence: MgB 2 wires and coils have been developed all over the world, due to their low cost and relatively high superconducting transition temperature of 39 K. MgB 2 wires and tapes can be fabricated by using the simple powder-in-tube (PIT) method, because of the absence of weak-link behavior at grain bound- aries in polycrystalline samples .
